item.title: Consistent and Resilient Trust
item.description:
Consistent and Resilient Trust by Elder L. Todd Budge, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 189th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder L. Todd Budge, Of the Seventy

item.description:

item.title: Seek Him with All Your Heart
item.description:
